client package¶

This describes the workings of the client program. It interfaces with the TBD api on http://HOST:PORT/api.

Subpackages¶

  • _dos package
    • Submodules
    • _dos.do_objects module
    • _dos.do_scenes module
    • Module contents

Submodules¶

client.command_line module¶

Terminal-like interface for interacting with calculix-clone.

class client.command_line.Terminal(host, port)[source]¶

Bases: cmd.Cmd

Send commands to the backend api.

This terminal-like interface sends commands to a running backend to change parameters, add data, etc. The address and port of this server are specified when Terminal is instantiated.

For every do_* function we also implement a help_* function, that overrides the docstring for the do_* function. This is so we can clearly separate the documentation of the client from the documentation of how to use the program.

__init__(host, port)[source]¶

Init function for the terminal.

Display the version on starting the program. Set a command prompt and a user agent. Then check if the target server backend is actually online and is also running the same version. If that is not the case terminate the client program.

Parameters:
  • host (str) – The IP of the target server backend.
  • port (int) – The port of the target, to which we are trying to connect.
Returns:

Nothing.
Return type:

None
__module__ = 'client.command_line'¶
cmdloop(intro=None)[source]¶

Override cmd.Cmd.cmdloop so we catch Ctrl-C keyboard interrupts without exiting the program.

Parameters:intro (str, defaults to None) – The ‘intro’ message. This message will be displayed when we press Ctrl-C.

do_objects(line)[source]¶

Calls the imported object function and returns the result.

See _dos.do_objects.objects for full documentation.

Parameters:line (str) – The parsed line from the command line.
Returns:A formatted string containing all the objects available.
Return type:str

client.command_line.parse_commandline()[source]¶

Parse the command line arguments.

Parameters:None – No parameters.
Returns:A namespace containing all the parsed command line arguments.
Return type:namespace

Notes

This function implements the defaults for the client program. The returned parameters and corresponding defaults are:

--host defaults to localhost
--port defaults to 8008
